text: Ernest Norman Hiskins (3 May 1918 - September 1972), a resident of Lichfield, Staffordshire, took part in the 1950 Monte Carlo Rally. ==Career== On 25 January 1950, Ernest, the owner of Midland Auto Electric Co. of Trent Valley Trading Estate, began the 1956-mile long journey from Glasgow to Monaco as he took part in the Monte Carlo Rally. He drove a Hillman Minx to 70th place. ==References== Category:English rally drivers Category:1918 births Category:1972 deaths
title: Ernest Hiskins
